result.reason: Frequent full tree reloads during SQL updates cause state loss (selection/expansion) and flickering, degrading UX in multi-user environments.
result.approach: In 'ConnectionTreeWindow.ConnectionsServiceOnConnectionsLoaded', capture the current expansion state and selected node (using 'ConstantID') before updating 'ConnectionTreeModel'. After the model update, restore the expansion state and selection to match the previous state.
